name: Crusaders of Might and Magic

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Crusaders of Might and Magic/crusaders.exe

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Crusaders of Might and Magic/crusaders.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2008 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  reset_desktop: true
  restore_gamma: true
wine:
  MouseWarpOverride: force
